column17:
Prada L' Eau Ambree Eau de Parfum - 80 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.4300

A beguiling woman with a deep and dark appeal she juggles an alluring sophistication with raw femininity. An endearing fabulist with a spritz of Prada Lâ€™Eau Ambree and this woman becomes utterly irresistible. Turning men into putty with nothing more than a wry smile she wears this sensual Eau De Parfum with panache. An inspiring accomplishment by acclaimed perfumer Daniela Roche-Andrier it is created for the esteemed house of Prada.

The top note opens with the a sprinkling of refreshing citruses over the delightful zest of Amalfi lemon bringing with it the essence of the sun-kissed Italian coast. Moving into the heart note tease your olfactory senses with a fragrant contrast of sweet feminine rose set against organic and slightly minty notes of patchouli. Finally the base note swirls together creamy hints of vanilla with smoky amber and honeyed resin of opoponax. This deep-scented luxury fragrance flaunts a unique and full-bodied aroma that is sure to leave you mesmerised. The rectangular brick-like bottle poses with a strong and daunting frame. Flaunting an intriguing gradient the hue ascends from ebony to a line of silver and topped with a simple gold stopper. As the sun sets and the nocturnal woman steps out of her mysterious lair this fragrance adds to her enigmatic presence.
